title: Long Term Review: YT’s Decoy 29 Core 4 eMTB is a true All Mountain e-bike
content:
Last year YT released its Decoy 29 eMTB, a steeper-angled option to its original e-mullet Decoy first introduced in 2017. The original 29/27.5” Decoy was Enduro focused and branded toward young talented rippers with a tagline about replacing the shuttle. The newest Decoy builds on YT’s experience with e-bikes and is a full 29er designed

The post Long Term Review: YT’s Decoy 29 Core 4 eMTB is a true All Mountain e-bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: John Herron
